attributes.action: withdraw choice based lettings and confirm the whole scheme is a total con
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now a proven fact that this scheme is a con as it now makes it harder for people to get a home that they need in their area as someone from outside the area can bid for it and beat them to it. The banding system which is regulated by the government is way out of touch with reality too. This in turn causes problems as it's not helping those of whom it should be.
